import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 42; value = 45+25; email = "shashankcvn@gmail.com"; isDisabled = false; color = 'Red'; name = "Shashank"; isSpecial = ""; getName(): number { return this.value; } addValue() { alert(this.name); } submitvalue(){ alert("You have successfully Submited....!!") } commented(){ alert("successfully commited"); } }
